about.intro: This enterprise-grade disaster recovery system demonstrates how modern businesses can achieve 99.99% uptime with automated backup, monitoring, and recovery capabilities. Built with production-ready technologies and battle-tested in real-world scenarios.
workflow: Content editors make changes via secure web interface
System automatically validates and saves changes to content.json
Instant backup to Backblaze B2 with integrity verification
Real-time monitoring tracks backup health and system status
Disaster simulation safely tests recovery procedures
One-click recovery restores complete site from cloud backup
Optional automated deployment to GitHub Pages or custom servers
Email and desktop alerts notify administrators of any issues

contact.message: Ready to protect your business from data loss? Contact our enterprise team to discuss custom disaster recovery solutions, SLA guarantees, and white-label deployment options.
